channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.5

item.title: CVE-2020-0900|2024-08-04T06:18:03.628Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.5
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Visual Studio Extension Installer Service improperly handles file operations, aka 'Visual Studio Extension Installer Service Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-0899|2024-08-04T06:18:03.489Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.5
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft Visual Studio updater service improperly handles file permissions, aka 'Microsoft Visual Studio Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.
